closed note 3937791 (near 8600, Southern Transdanubia, 8600, Hungary) / * 2023 October 13 06:10 Pan Perníček Created: Forwarding anonymous report from #Mapycz user, please verify: There's Deli Market. / * 2023 December 16 18:53 urbalazs Resolved: I added to the map.

closed note 3951028 (near 8237, Central Transdanubia, 8237, Hungary) / * 2023 October 21 12:13 Johanna707 Created: Unable to answer "What’s the surface here?" for https://osm.org/way/297233841 via StreetComplete 54.1: / Műkő. / * 2023 December 16 18:39 urbalazs Resolved: A műkő az a térkő (paving_stones) kategóriába esik. Mivel a jelölő nem egyértelműen egy útra mutat, nem tudom, hogy melyik szakaszra adjam meg ezt az értéket. Ezt a jegyzetet most lezárom.

closed note 3579735 (near 8237, Central Transdanubia, 8237, Hungary) / * 2023 March 1 10:55 Pan Perníček Created: Forwarding anonymous report from #Mapy.cz user, please verify: There's a spring. / * 2023 December 16 18:37 urbalazs Resolved: The spring is already there, nearby.

closed note 3941894 (near MOL Horgásztanya, Tihany) / * 2023 October 15 14:46 ironalloy Created: hiányzó épületek / * 2023 October 15 15:44 bkil Updated: Köszönjük a hibajelzést. A mellette lévő utcában hiányzik a legtöbb házszám és a POI-kat is jó lenne végigjárni, hogy léteznek-e még illetve változott-e vagy hiányzik-e valamelyik jellemzőjük. / * 2023 December 16 18:36 urbalazs Resolved: Nagyon sok más épület is hiányzik a térképről, de ez nem hiba, hanem még nem rajzolta meg senki. A jegyzet funkció a térkép hibáinak jelzésére szolgál. Az elérhető műholdképeken a jelzett helyen még nem láthatók épületek. Most lezárom ezt a jegyzetet.

closed note 3969080 (near 1092, Central Hungary, 1092, Hungary) / * 2023 November 2 06:38 orthocircular Created: A user reported trouble navigating from Üllői út to Kálvin tér (westbound) via this intersection. I agree I can't see a route in OSM for that, there are too many one-way paths in preventing travel in that direction. Can a local user double check this complex intersection? / * 2023 December 9 14:07 urbalazs Resolved: I fixed the intersection. It should be good now. / * 2023 December 13 14:35 infeeeee Reactivated: / * 2023 December 13 14:36 infeeeee Updated: Needs an extra double check, sources are contradicting / * 2023 December 14 20:29 orthocircular Updated: Thanks for all your work! Local users appreciate it. / * 2023 December 16 18:19 infeeeee Resolved: I surveyed the intersection today: https://www.osm.org/changeset/145193082 / Your user was not right: currently you can only turn right from Üllői út, it's forbidden to turn westbound, so the map was correct at the time of the creation of this note, now I reverted to the previous state, and made some other fixes.

closed note 3894940 (near 8242, Central Transdanubia, 8242, Hungary) / * 2023 September 18 09:07 Matyjace Created: Forwarding anonymous report from #mapycz user, please verify: "closed" / * 2023 December 16 18:08 urbalazs Resolved: I set is as disused.

new comment 3541222 (near 4183, North Great Plain, 4183, Hungary) / * 2023 December 16 18:07 nslxndr Updated: My previous comment is a standard response as member of the Hungary Community in case of reporting missing map features. See our wiki page: https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Hungary/T%C3%A9rk%C3%A9pjegyzetek-Bejelent%C3%A9sek / My personal opinion is same. This note is quite old and not resolved for a long time. It does not provide enough information for a map editor to add it to the map or fix it in the map (in contrast of mentioned street name, address, which can be added/fixed by editing). We are working hard on the improvement of the map, but our resources are limited. We are very welcomed your help for the adding of the missing map features. If you want, you can decide to add memorial indicating the source of information (optionally tagging with fixme=resurvey if unsure). Map notes are not for marking probably existing items, otherwise without awareness their count increases to an unmanageable amount.
new note 4030769 (near 9200, Western Transdanubia, 9200, Hungary) / * 2023 December 16 18:04 efi99 Created: cím jó?

closed note 3791214 (near Rigótanya, Aszófő) / * 2023 July 21 12:44 capsule_man Created: "Closed" / The place has gone or never existed. A user of Organic Maps application has reported that the POI was visible on the map (see snapshot date below), but was not found on the ground. / OSM snapshot date: 2023-07-10T17:38:00Z / POI name: Kerékpáros majdnem kemping / POI types: internet_access-wlan tourism-camp_site / #organicmaps / * 2023 December 16 18:03 urbalazs Resolved: 2 hónapja OSM-en is bezárt.

closed note 3969471 (near 8241, Central Transdanubia, 8241, Hungary) / * 2023 November 2 11:17 ironalloy Created: "nincs itt" / OSM snapshot date: 2023-10-09T16:37:32Z / POI name: Sétarepülés / POI types: tourism-attraction / #organicmaps android / * 2023 December 16 18:02 urbalazs Resolved: Benne van a leírásban, hogy szezonális. Nyilván októberben nincs ott, csak nyáron érhető el.

new comment 3541222 (near 4183, North Great Plain, 4183, Hungary) / * 2023 December 16 18:01 bkil Updated: In this specific case, as described above, we had to consider the given information null for legal reasons. If you have no further information from a source we are allowed to use, we should either resurvey this or close the note.

new comment 3541222 (near 4183, North Great Plain, 4183, Hungary) / * 2023 December 16 17:04 ivanbranco Updated: Though notes are not only to report map defects? / "Use this feature to report an error in the data or to give some additional information, for instance the name of a street or an address etc." / I think this note is part of the "give additional information", the information being that there's probably a memorial to be added. Don't you agree?
reactivated note 3541222 (near 4183, North Great Plain, 4183, Hungary) / * 2023 December 16 17:02 ivanbranco Reactivated:

closed note 3541222 (near 4183, North Great Plain, 4183, Hungary) / * 2023 February 1 21:13 ivanbranco Created: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Kaba_hull%C3%A1s-hely(1)(1).jpg / commons says there's a stone memorial around here, could someone verify it? / * 2023 April 13 12:12 Megya Updated: Yes, it is there. You can see it in this Google Street photo in the centre: https://www.google.com/maps/@47.3792995,21.2766447,3a,15y,0.15h,89.6t/data=!3m6!1e1!3m4!1sdLHICdAcy6jDoXudX30nCw!2e0!7i16384!8i8192 / * 2023 April 13 12:19 ivanbranco Updated: Unfortunately Google Street can't be used as a source to map in OSM / * 2023 April 13 13:47 Megya Updated: You mean, should I supply another evidence of the existence of the object, otherwise it cannot be treated as _verified_? / * 2023 April 13 14:56 bkil Updated: Yes. https://wiki.osm.org/Street-level_imagery_services https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trap_street / * 2023 December 16 16:59 nslxndr Resolved: Dear Reporter, thank you for your request, but unfortunately the missing map features are not map defect. Not only this area, but many area in the country has a lot of missing map features. I close this report now, because this is not a map defect.
